name: Small Santa Stories
description:
This game was made in 9 days for the Winter VN Jam 2021.

The game focuses on Santa as he tries to complete his deliveries even though his sleigh has run out of presents.

Features:

  • A game with a Christmas theme
  • Visual novel style!
  • Different achievements
  • Interact with different people
  • Save Christmas!

For mobile versions please check the Google play store link below

Can I stream this game?

Of course, we made this game to be family friendly and music is all royalty free. You can find credits for the music in the main menu (at the house)

Controls:

W/Space/Up = Jump

Arrows/AD = Movement

E/S/X = Use

Z/Q = Wrap or Throw
